Paragraph: Furthermore , PTATDPP shows a promising PCE of 4.23% when a non-fullerene acceptor ( di-PBI ) is used as an electron acceptor material for the PSC device.

| PTATDPP |
| di-PBI |

Explanation:

* PTATDPP: This is a material name as it is mentioned as a specific material used in the PSC device.
* di-PBI: This is also a material name as it is mentioned as an electron acceptor material used in the PSC device.
